import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';


# Structure Entries

The Structure Entries tag extends the functionality of the [Channel Entries tag](./channel-entries.mdx) so all of the parameters and functionality documented for that tag will also apply here.

<Tabs>
<TabItem value="native" label="Native">

```php
{exp:structure:entries}
    {title}
{/exp:structure:entries}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="twig" label="Twig">

```twig
{% for entry in exp.structure.entries %}
    {{ entry.title }}
{% endfor %}
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="blade" label="Blade">

```php
@foreach($exp->structure->entries as $entry)
    {{ $entry->title }}
@endforeach
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="graphql" label="GraphQL">

```graphql
{
    exp_structure_entries {
        data {
            title
        }
    }
}
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

## Parameters

These are a few of the parameters and behaviors that are unique to the Structure Entries tag.

### Parent ID

Determine which children to show within the entries tag. A value of 0 will show the top level.

```php
parent_id: 5
```
